description:
Start your backcountry mornings with waffles. No, not the food. This waffle grid fleece pullover is made with wicking fabric that regulates your temperature so you stay dry and comfortable whether you're hiking or chilling. When the cold rolls in, slip your thumbs into the thumb loops and pull up the fabric around your neck to stay cozy and covered.

  • ActiveTemp fleece regulates temperature to keep hands warm without overheating
  • Fabric has UPF 30 sun protection
  • Raglan sleeves for unrestricted range of motion
  • Cowl neck and thumb holes provide coverage options
name: Outdoor Research Trail Mix Cowl Pullover - Women's
